mapper.select: select p.id, p.insideCode, ddg.genderName as gender, p.birthday, ddm.marriageName as marriage, ddedul.eduLevelName as eduLevel, ddedud.degreeName as eduDegree, p.homeTel, p.mobileTel, p.officeTel, p.email, p.address, p.zip from zh_person p LEFT JOIN zh_dd_gender ddg on p.gender = ddg.genderCode LEFT JOIN zh_dd_marriage ddm on p.marriage = ddm.marriageCode LEFT JOIN zh_dd_edulevel ddedul on p.eduLevel = ddedul.eduLevelCode LEFT JOIN zh_dd_edudegree ddedud on p.eduDegree = ddedud.degreeCode where insideCode = #{insideCode}
